p: Except for the hexane extract from P.B, all SIs suggest that these extracts are selective since they were more active against L. ( V) panamensis than U937 cells. Leishmanicidal activity displayed by these extracts against intracellular amastigotes of L. ( V) panamensis suggests that they are promising candidates in the search for new antileishmanial compounds, mainly ethyl acetate extract from L.S, exhibited high SI and activity comparable to the conventional drug - meglumine antimoniate.
